name: TheCreativeReview
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Welcome to The Creative Review, the daily Alexa Flash Briefing that delves into the latest advertising creative. I'm your host Lamar Phillips, a New York based copywriter with a passion for all things creative.

Each day, we'll explore the most innovative, thought-provoking and entertaining advertisements from around the world. From captivating TV spots to interactive social media campaigns, we'll take a deep dive into the creative process behind each piece and uncover what makes it truly exceptional.

So whether you're an ad industry insider, a marketing enthusiast, or simply someone who appreciates great creativity, you'll find something to inspire you on The Creative Review. Tune in every day for a quick hit of advertising brilliance, and join me as we celebrate the best of the best in the world of advertising.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
